filepath="$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH"; case "$filepath" in *.test.*|*.spec.*|*_test.*) echo '{"feedback": "ðŸ§ª Test file modified. Run tests to verify."}' ;; esac; exit 0
